turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I wanted to make an order from Peet's Coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let me get a medium rosed iced vanilla latte with whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you say medium iced vanilla latte with whole milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, a medium-sized, medium roast iced vanilla latte with whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, where do you want to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to get that at the location right around the corner from me on 591 Broadway in Sonoma.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the peet's store at 591 broadway.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And did you send me a receipt?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you will receive it via email.
